bibl.title: with contributions by Adam BÜLOW-JACOBSEN, Magica varia.
bibl.note: 1. A Magical Formulary (P. Carlsberg 52). - 2. A Christian Prayer Amulet (P. Louvre E 7332 bis). - 3. A Charitesion (P. dem. Louvre E 3229). - 4. Figurae Magicae (P. Berol. 21718-21720). - 5. Magic Crystal (Äg. Mus. Berlin).
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Berol. Inv. 21718-21720 P. Carlsberg 52 P. Paris Louvre Inv. E 7332 bis
BRASHEAR William M., with contributions by Adam BÜLOW-JACOBSEN, Magica varia. (Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 25.)
Bruxelles, Fondation Égyptologique Reine Élisabeth, 1991, 8°, 84 pp. et 15 pll. 500 fr. b.

1. A Magical Formulary (P. Carlsberg 52). - 2. A Christian Prayer Amulet (P. Louvre E 7332 bis). - 3. A Charitesion (P. dem. Louvre E 3229). - 4. Figurae Magicae (P. Berol. 21718-21720). - 5. Magic Crystal (Äg. Mus. Berlin).

C.R. par Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 73 (1993) pp. 286-288 [concerne aussi: IDEM, A Mithraic Catechism from Egypt (Wien, 1992)]. - Françoise Perpillou-Thomas, REG 106 (1993) p. 256. - Jean A. Straus, AntCl 62 (1993) pp. 444-445. - Maria Totti-Gemünd, Gnomon 68 (1996) pp. 9-13. - Terry G. Wilfong, BASP 30 (1993) pp. 73-75.
